TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeDomComponentSerializationService extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.ComponentSerializationService
Public NotInheritable Class CodeDomComponentSerializationService Inherits ComponentSerializationService

summary.span: 将一组组件序列化到一个序化列存储区中。

span.span: Serializes a set of components into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将一组组件或可序列化的对象序列化到序列化存储区中。The class serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 稍后可以反序列化该存储区。The store can then be deserialized at a later time. 类不同于其他序列化方案，因为序列化格式是不透明的，并且它允许对象的部分序列化。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，您可以选择仅序列化对象的选定属性。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 基类 将替换 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中的 接口，但保留后者以实现向后兼容性。The base class, , replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility. 类不实现 接口，但如果查询 ，则 会提供一个桥接实现以确保向后兼容性。The class does not implement the interface, but if you query for , the provides a bridge implementation to ensure backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化存储区可传递给任意 方法，以生成一组对象的序列化状态。The serialization store can be passed to any of the methods to build up serialization state for a group of objects.

summary.span: 将给定 反序列化为给定容器，还可以应用默认属性值。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container, optionally applying default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法反序列化给定的存储，而不是生成新对象，而是将存储区中的数据应用于从 `container` 参数获取的一组现有对象。The method deserializes the given store, but rather than producing new objects, the data in the store is applied to an existing set of objects that are taken from the `container` parameter. 因此，调用方可以提前创建一个对象，但它可以看到合适的对象。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果对象具有反序列化状态，并且在现有对象集中没有命名该对象，则将创建一个新的对象。If an object has deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果该对象还实现 ，则会将其添加到给定容器。If that object also implements , it will be added to the given container. 容器中的对象必须具有与序列化存储区中的对象相匹配的名称和类型，才能使用现有对象。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

summary.span: 在给定对象上序列化给定成员。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于同一对象，可以多次调用此方法，以便在序列化存储区中生成序列化成员的列表。This method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 成员通常必须是属性或事件。The member generally has to be a property or an event.

summary.span: 在给定对象上序列化给定成员，但如果成员包含默认属性值，则也序列化该成员。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, but also serializes the member if it contains the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于某些成员，包含默认属性值并将相同的值设置回成员的概念是不同的概念。For some members, containing the default property value and setting the same value back to the member are different concepts. 例如，如果在未设置本地值的情况下，属性从父对象中继承其值，则将值设置回属性可能不是所需的值。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object if no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法将考虑这一点，并在这种情况下清除属性的状态。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.
